page2.title: Research
page2.content: Explanation-based Weakly-supervised Learning of Visual Relations with Graph Networks . Federico Baldassarre, Kevin Smith, Josephine Sullivan, Hossein Azizpour A novel weakly-supervised method for visual relationship detection that relies on minimal image-level predicate labels, graph networks, and attribution-based explanations. Conference paper at ECCV 2020 . | GraphQA: Protein Model Quality Assessment using Graph Convolutional Network . Federico Baldassarre, David Menéndez Hurtado, Arne Elofsson, Hossein Azizpour Representing protein structure as 3D graphs to automatically assess the quality of folded models. Bioinformatics Journal (Oxford University Press) . | Explainability Techniques for Graph Convolutional Networks . Federico Baldassarre, Hossein Azizpour How do Sensitivity Analysis, Guided Backpropagation, and Layer-Wise Relevance Propagation behave when applied to Graph Neural Networks? Spotlight talk at ICML 2019 Workshop "Learning and Reasoning with Graph-Structured Representations". . | Morphing architectures for pose-based image generation of people in clothing . Federico Baldassarre Given the picture of a person and of a clothing item, generate the image of the person wearing it. Master's thesis at Zalando Research, 2018. . | Deep Koalarization . Federico Baldassarre, Diego González Morín, Lucas Rodés-Guirao Grayscale image colorization using deep CNN and Inception-ResNet-v2 Best project award, Deep Learning course at KTH, 2017. . | .
